Prep Time: 10 min
Ready in: 40 min
Servings 4

Ingredients:
2 tablespoons oil
1 onion , finely minced
1 clove garlic , minced
1 lb fresh green beans or 1 (15 ounce) can green beans , drained
salt and pepper
3 tablespoons slivered almonds
3 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in skillet.
2. Add onion and garlic and sauté until golden brown.
3. Add green beans and cook slowly until hot.
4. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Stir in almonds.
6. Sprinkle with cheese just before serving.
